title: Bitcoin touches $28,000 as whales, long-term holders ramp up accumulation
description:
As Bitcoin briefly surpassed the $28,000 mark, whales and long-term holders were quick to accumulate during the weekend volatility. With a noticeable uptick in whale and shark addresses, as well as a surge in long-term holders' NPL, the market's reaction is intriguing. However, an unexpected trend in the sell-side risk ratio raises a critical question: what does this mean for Bitcoin's future and how will it impact the market's stability? Find out the answer behind the Alpha paywall...

The post Bitcoin touches $28,000 as whales, long-term holders ramp up accumulation appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Hoskinson proposes ‘generative AI-proof watermarking’ to thwart deep fakes
description:
Input Output CEO Charles Hoskinson said the emergence of AI deep fakes would force us to assume everything we see and hear is fraudulent. AI deep fakes to become indistinguishable from real life During a recent AMA, Hoskinson was asked about using blockchain technology to authenticate visual content. In response, he acknowledged that a verification […]

The post Hoskinson proposes ‘generative AI-proof watermarking’ to thwart deep fakes appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bali government cracks down on foreign tourists’ crypto use
description: There might be better places to use your favorite crypto as payment than the beautiful Indonesian island of Bali.The government of Bali has recently raised its attempts to discourage visitors from using cryptos as payment, stressing that only the country’s fiat currency will recognize as legal money.  According to the news agency Antara, Governor Wayan ... title: Over $250m worth of OP tokens set to enter circulation
description: A substantial number of $OP tokens, totaling 154.6 million ($252 million), will be unlocked within a day, making them accessible for trading or transfer.

title: As Coinbase Faces Regulatory Struggle, Investors Lend Support to AltSignals Presale
description:
With the cryptocurrency market showing promising signs of recovery in the first half of the year, AltSignals has emerged as a project attracting significant interest from investors worldwide. In addition, the presale event of its ASI token is drawing attention, while crypto exchanges like Coinbase face regulatory roadblocks.  This landscape is prompting novice and seasoned [...]
